summary: An ordinance accepting deeds from Ralph H. Foster, G. Clinton Bennett and L.B. Stedman, Trustees under the last will and testament of Alfred F. Nichols, deceased; Stephen Berg and Rachel Berg, his wife; Elfrida Skogkvist, (formerly Elfrida Olson) executrix of Carl O. Olson, deceased, to property in block 10, Fairview Homestead Association for the benefit of Mechanics and Laborers, acquired for playfield purposes.
